title: Looking for boyfriend to treat me nice.
body:
fill my form out and i'll get back to you whether or not you're legible for my perfection.   {{champion:51}} 

Rank in league:
Hotness 1-10:
How nice are you? 
write something about yourself that might make me attracted to you:

replies.body: i really hope this is a joke
this person has some sort of mental disability i assure you.
so mad. Yet can sense a tad of jealousy.

Oh I remember you in game, you were a %%%%%% along with your %%%%%% friend. Wasn't funny nor was it trolling, was just pretty lame.

Heres my form:

get on my level of aesthetics, drop to a body fat of 6 percent or lower (no body water retention).

Then you may come at me bro.

sincerely, the sexiest being on the planet slutt.

I remember you being a rude jerk but I don't recall myself doing whatever you're talking about. I'll add you to the list of gym junkies that i never want to touch or even get involved with. Thank you for your time :)

Your trolling right now.

I have never seen someone %%%%k up a game more than you. Not in a funny way either. Like I can take a joke, but I've been in two games with you and you %%%%ed them both.

Don't get how your not perma banned. 

And then when I say things im the bad guy.

What are you even talking about? What did I do in games to make you so angry at me? I never afk and I never intentionally feed or troll. Who's to say I'm trolling rightnow? You don't know me. If you cant be nice with what you say, don't post. Thanks.

I think Officer Caitlyn must date whoever gets the most upvotes here. That is why I am offering $4,000,000,000 for anyone who upvotes me.
This money will be paid upon my own death, by my children. Thank you for listening.
Quick guys, upvote me, screw Cait over!

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=yhAEvqcu,comment-id=000a0000,timestamp=2015-01-07T11:55:25.948+0000)
>
> Quick guys, upvote me, screw Cait over!

I will upvote all of your stuff and downvote everyone, including myself, so I may have a chance with you when you and Cait break up.
This is why I love you. ♥

Hmm... What the hell.

How nice are you? **Nice? Please, I'm HeartFine**

Bronze 5
Hotness level 1 (1 being ugly as fu)
I hate people i hate animals and i definately already hate you
yourself
jɔːˈsɛlf,jʊə-,jə-/Submit

used to refer to the person being addressed as the object of a verb or preposition when they are also the subject of the clause.

{{champion:51}} must be killed with{{item:3031}}

Rank in League: Silver V baby, and I totally deserve to be there ;)
Hotness: Well, normally I would say ten, but it started raining and it is getting a little cold, so let's go with a four.
How nice are you? I live in a freezer, because I'm nice, nice, baby (I feel like that pun was too stretched out).
Write something about yourself that might make me attracted to you: I leave my house around once a fortnight and only shower once a week or so, so you can tell I am a dirty boy.
